data.name: SuperTrucks Offroad
data.detailed_description:
v1.5 Update is coming in January!!!


I've been busy on the big 1.5 update, which will be the games biggest yet.

The update will contain a completely new AI system, with more intelligent AI trucks with much more realistic driving behaviour.

The game has had a complete overhaul with with brand new tracks and track artwork developed for the game. The 1.5 update will contain 10 new tracks as well as have some remakes of the old tracks.

In addition, several other fixes and improvements have been made.

-------------------------------

SuperTrucks Offroad is a top-down racer inspired by the arcade/NES classic 'Ironman Super Offroad', bringing you offroad arcade racing action that is easy to pick up, but hard to master!

Race against other trucks in a variety of offroad stadiums and weather conditions, and compete in bonus events and set new leaderboard records and earn big money to upgrade your truck!

  • Race in classic top-down or chase camera view
  • Race against your friends in realtime multiplayer
  • Sand, mud and snow track conditions
  • Unlock the Obstacle Course, Long Jump and Time Trial events as you progress in career mode
  • 6 truck components to upgrade to help improve your racing ability
  • Customise the look of your truck with a wide variety of decals, paints and tyre options
  • Career mode takes you across 7 cities in the USA, with each having its own champion and challenges you need to overcome

data.short_description: SuperTrucks Offroad is a top-down racer inspired by the arcade/NES classic 'Ironman Super Offroad' bringing you offroad arcade racing action that is easy to pick up, but hard to master!
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Celeron
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia or ATI DirectX9 Compatible Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel I3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia or ATI DirectX11 Compatible Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
